select
from food f inner join seller s on s.seller_id = f.seller_id inner join forder fo on fo.food_id = f.food_id where f.food_id in ( select food_id from forder where student_id = #{studentId} ) limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
select count(order_id) from forder where student_id = #{studentId}

select fo.order_time as orderTime, fo.take_time as takeTime, fo.send_time as sendTime, se.sender_name as senderName, se.sender_telephone as senderTelephone from forder fo left join sender se on fo.sender_id = se.sender_id where fo.order_id = #{orderId}
and fo.sender_id = #{senderId}
